page.title: 04Aeroplanes effect on people
page.content: On the 20th of June 1985 Daniel and I went and asked Kevin for his view about the RAF planes flying over Kirby Hill. He said that it disturbs him when he goes to sleep, planes also disturb him when he is playing games and when he looks at one flying in the suns rays, it hurts his eyes. he also says when he looks at one while riding his bike he crashes! We talked to Mrs Benson about the planes that come over. She complains bitterly about them. She rings up their base to sens them the other way. When she was teaching, the children ducked under the tables when a bomber came over. It scares her when a plane flies low over her house.
